synopsis.text:
In the wake of their triumph at the World Championships, the Bladebreakers have dispersed, each pursuing their own paths. Tyson, however, is still basking in the glory of their victory. The peace is shattered when a mysterious group, Saint Shields, emerges, defeating each Bladebreaker and attempting to seize their sacred Bit-beasts. The real threat, however, is a clandestine organization, Psykick, which covets the power of these Bit-beasts and is ruthless in its pursuit, even resorting to kidnapping.

To combat these new adversaries, the Bladebreakers must reunite, overcoming personal challenges and ego clashes. The stakes are higher than ever, as they face not only the cyber-BitBeasts of Psykick but also the relentless pursuit of Saint Shields. Will the Bladebreakers manage to protect their Bit-beasts and triumph over these formidable foes? The stage is set for epic battles and unexpected alliances in this thrilling continuation of their Beyblading journey.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
